IHttpRequest CreateHttpRequest (HttpMethod requestType)
Creates an HTTP request based on the specified request type.
Member Function Documentation
CreateHttpRequest() CreateHttpRequestnetwork.HttpRequestFactory network.HttpRequestFactoryCreateHttpRequest
IHttpRequest network.HttpRequestFactory.CreateHttpRequest (HttpMethod requestType)[inline]
Creates an HTTP request based on the specified request type.
Parameters
requestType
The HTTP method to be used for the request, such as GET or POST.
Returns
An instance of IHttpRequest corresponding to the specified request type.
Exceptions
ArgumentException
Thrown when the provided requestType is not supported.
This method is responsible for generating different types of HTTP requests based on the provided requestType . If the request type is HttpMethod.Get, it creates an instance of HttpGetRequest. If the request type is HttpMethod.Post, it creates an instance of HttpPostRequest. If the request type does not match any supported methods, an ArgumentException is thrown indicating that the request type is invalid. This allows for flexible handling of various HTTP methods in a clean and organized manner.
The documentation for this class was generated from the following file: /tmp/github_repos_arch_doc_gen/SingularityX-ai/falling-blocks/unity/four-block/Assets/network/HttpRequestFactory.cs
